blocks.title: AI-Powered Form Building Starts Here
blocks.content: Use WPForms AI to instantly add choices to dropdowns, checkboxes, and multiple-choice selections. Just type a quick description and watch the choices appear, as if by magic.

alt.url: https://wpforms.com/introducing-ai-choices-a-new-era-in-form-building-starts-today/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=AI Choices Learn More Lite

blocks.title: AI-Powered Form Building Starts Here

blocks.title: Revolutionize Forms with Repeatable Fields
blocks.content: The repeater field lets visitors duplicate fields with a click. It's perfect for job applications, registrations, and so much more. Make your forms more flexible and collect all the information you need.

main.url: https://wpforms.com/wpforms-lite-upgrade/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=Repeater Field Upgrade to Pro Lite

blocks.title: Display Order Summaries
blocks.content: Give your customers peace of mind with a full breakdown of their order, including quantities and discounts. Display the summary before or after checkout to increase trust and conversions.

main.url: https://wpforms.com/docs/how-to-require-payment-total-with-a-wordpress-form/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=plugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=Order Summary Get Started BasicPlusProElite#enable-total-summary
